fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Fang of the Mountain King__
Signature Weapon.

__Beacon of the Reed Sea__
Best 5-star alternative. Can risk over-capping on CRIT Rate but can take advantage of the passive through Burning self-damage.

__Earth Shaker R5__
Best F2P option. Passive is easily triggered and greatly benefits Kinich.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Verdict, Wolf's Gravestone, Unforged, Redhorn Stonethresher, Serpent Spine R5__
ATK% or CRIT stat sticks.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> Dendro DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Canopy Hunter: Riding High 
**2)** Elemental Burst: Hail to the Almighty Dragonlord

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Since the __Obsidian Codex__ set grants Kinich a massive amount of CRIT Rate, it can be beneficial to prioritize ATK% and CRIT DMG. However, his damage is mainly from a few large hits so going for high CRIT Rate (~90%) can also be beneficial.

While his damage is mainly from Elemental Skill damage, the __Golden Troupe__ set is not recommended since he requires a lot of field time and cannot make use of it's buffs.
